description: A Checkout Item represents every product being purchased in a Checkout Session.

amount.description: Unit price of the item being purchased.

currency.description: Three-letter [ISO currency code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217), in uppercase. Must be a supported currency in your payment processors.

description.description: The description of the item being purchased.

name.description: The name of the item being purchased.

product.description: The SKU of the Quaderno `Product` being purchased.

quantity.description: Quantity of the item being purchased.
